{{ fullname | escape | underline}}

.. currentmodule:: {{ module }}

.. autoclass:: {{ objname }}

   {% block methods %}
   {% if methods %}
   .. rubric:: {{ _('Methods') }}

   .. autosummary::
      :template: autosummary/method.rst
      :toctree:
      :nosignatures:
      {% for item in methods %}
         {%- if not item.startswith('_') or not item in ['__init__'] %}
         ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
         {%- endif -%}
   {%- endfor %}
   {% endif %}
   {% endblock %}

   {% block attributes %}
   {% if attributes %}
   .. rubric:: {{ _('Attributes') }}

   .. autosummary::
   {% for item in attributes %}
      ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
   {%- endfor %}
   {% endif %}
   {% endblock %}
